name: Homeppl (Techstars Company)
slogan: Fairer access to financial and property products with your true creditworthiness
description:
Homeppl is on a mission to give people fairer access to financial and property related products with their true creditworthiness. 

We leverage Open Banking, risk and financial algorithms, and behavioural analytics to identify legitimate customers and ensure they get fairer access to financial products with their own creditworthiness. 

Clients use Homeppl to increase revenue, prevent fraud, and eliminate transactional friction. Homeppl has reviewed hundreds of thousands of transactions and approved millions of pounds of revenue for clients in the UK.

We are a Techstars company. Our team is comprised of ambitious, international, and passionate individuals. We are from 24 nationalities and speak over 17 languages!

jobs.title: React Javascript Developer
jobs.description:
ABOUT Homeppl

Homeppl is on a mission to give people fairer access to financial and property related products with their true creditworthiness. 

We leverage Open Banking, risk and financial algorithms, and behavioural analytics to identify legitimate customers and ensure they get fairer access to financial products with their own creditworthiness. 

Clients use Homeppl to increase revenue, prevent fraud, and eliminate transactional friction. Homeppl has reviewed hundreds of thousands of transactions and approved millions of pounds of revenue for clients in the UK.

We are a Techstars company. Our team is comprised of ambitious, international, and passionate individuals.


THE ROLE

We are looking to hire an experienced Javascript developer who has at least two years experience working as a frontend developer. 

We expect you to have the following experience:
- Multiple JS frameworks (Vue/React/Angular)
- REST and GraphQL API (consuming and building)
- SQL Databases (Aurora MySQL)
- NoSQL DB (DDB)
- AWS Development environment (must have)
- Git source code management
- UX Design experience
- Willing to learn Python 
- React experience (React-final-form, AJV validator, Material-ui jss styling) 

You will have the opportunity and shape the user experience and interface of several projects. We are in the process of modernizing and optimizing our software assists so now is an ideal time to join and grow with the team.


OUR DREAM HIRE:

*Passion for modern web UI software
*Understands Design Thinking and UX design principles
*Interested in AWS Serverless stack
*Working experience with AWS AppSync
*Record in creating outstanding technology
*Takes pride in building a positive user experience
*Good inter-personal skills and amicable
*Interested in FinTech or PropTech or Identity 


OTHER HOMEPPL PERKS: 
- The Holidays - 25 paid holidays; 
- The Space - Beer fridge, Weekly events, brand new cool offices in Old Street with showers, café, balconies, space for bikes; 
- The People - being part of the world's best FinTech related companies and entrepreneurs in one building;


EQUALITY OF OPPORTUNITY:
We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

jobs.title: Operations Analyst
jobs.description:
ABOUT HOMEPPL

Homeppl is on a mission to give people fairer access to financial and property related products with their true creditworthiness. 

We leverage Open Banking, risk and financial algorithms, and behavioural analytics to identify legitimate customers and ensure they get fairer access to financial products with their own creditworthiness. 

Clients use Homeppl to increase revenue, prevent fraud, and eliminate transactional friction. Homeppl has reviewed hundreds of thousands of transactions and approved millions of pounds of revenue for clients in the UK.

We are looking for ambitious and passionate individuals to join our dynamic, diverse, and international team (we are 23 nationalities and speak over 16 languages) as Homeppl is growing! 

THE OPPORTUNITY:

You will impact people’s lives. You will handle sensitive backstage operations, and your work can help people land their dream home or find the financial product they need.

You will be using our unique data validations tools, tests, and methodologies, helping users demonstrate their creditworthiness so that they can gain fair access to property and financial products. 

You will learn about FinTech, Operations, and Customer Support methodologies and metrics.

You will learn our processes, think critically, engage empathetically, and find the right answer to quickly become a trusted confidant to our customers and clients. 

In our flat-hierarchy team, you will be directly working with other areas of the business including Product and Business Development and Sales. We work as one single united happy team. 

The opportunity is a minimum 3-month contract available immediately, with a strong potential to extend to a permanent position.

YOU WILL:

- Engage with our users to ensure a seamless user experience,
- Collaborate with business, product, and tech teams,
- Circulate insights to influence and improve Homeppl’s value,
- Manage sensitive information and backstage operations,
- Contribute to sales strategy and identify efficiencies in the sales and operations processes.

YOU ARE:

- Empathetic, putting yourself in the shoes of others to understand their situation and establish trust,
- Overachiever, going above and beyond the call of duty and always hungry to deliver,
- Sincere, honest and direct; no beating around the bush,
- Committed to the cause, relish a challenge and thrive in the face of adversity,
- Passionate, about something not necessarily work-related, we will be spending a lot of time together, we want you to love us and vice versa!

IT WOULD BE COOL IF YOU HAD:

An interest in FinTech / PropTech, 
Previous experience working in a startup environment;
Previous experience in a customer-facing role,

BENEFITS

- Work at Rise in the heart of Shoreditch, London
- Be part of a vibrant, dynamic, and creative entrepreneurial environment 
- Beer on tap, pizza, and ping-pong on Fridays 
- Free yoga and deals on fitness classes 
- Kitchen full of stocked fruit and snack cupboard 
- Team lunch every week!

Salary: £16,000.00 to £21,000.00 pa

Note: Unfortunately, we are unable to sponsor visas for this role.

THE ROLE

We are looking to hire a Mid-level Python Engineer who has 4+ years experience working as a Python developer. 

We expect you to have the following skills and experience:
- Python Django experience
- Celery experience
- Docker experience
- AWS Lambda experience
- REST and GraphQL API (consuming and building)
- SQL Databases (Aurora)
- NoSQL DB (DDB)
- AWS Development environment (CloudFormation, CloudWatch)
- Git source code management
- CI and CD experience
- Contribute design and Architecture
- Problem solver 

You will have the opportunity to scale our Python services and to deliver modern applications on AWS. If you are looking to become a serverless expert then this is a great opportunity.
